history.proof: intros j H. intros k' m' H2. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type a : action W A this i : state r : cont A j : forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m) H : i \\In Coh W Unable to unify "?M1567 \\In Coh ?M1562 -> forall p : proc this ?M1562 ?M1563, p \\In code_of ?M1565 -> after ?M1567 p ?M1568" with "proc this W A".

exceptions.tactic: intros y k m [pf pf_step] H0 H1.

exceptions.exn: Applied theorem does not have enough premises.

exceptions.tactic: intros y' l H2 H3 H4.

exceptions.exn: In environment this : nid W : world A : Type a : action W A this i : state r : cont A j : forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m) H : i \\In Coh W k' : proc this W A m' : k' \\In code_of (act a) H2 : seq schedule The term "j" has type "forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m)" while it is expected to have type "union_map Label dstatelet".

In environment this : nid W : world A : Type a : action W A this i : state r : cont A j : forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m) H : i \\In Coh W k' : proc this W A m' : k' \\In code_of (act a) H2 : seq schedule The term "m'" has type "k' = Unfinished \\/ k' = Act a" while it is expected to have type "union_map Label dstatelet".

In environment this : nid W : world A : Type a : action W A this i : state r : cont A j : forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m) H : i \\In Coh W k' : proc this W A m' : k' \\In code_of (act a) H2 : seq schedule The term "j" has type "forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m)" while it is expected to have type "union_map Label dstatelet".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
this: nid
W: world
A: Type
a: action W A this
i: state
r: cont A

Goal:
(forall j : state, network_rely W this i j -> a_safe a j /\ (forall (y : A) (k m : state), (exists pf : a_safe a j, a_step pf k y) -> network_rely W this k m -> r y m)) -> verify i (act a) r

Premises:
world = (context * hooks)%type : Type
cont = fun A : Type => A -> state -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments cont _%type_scope
action = Actions.action : world -> Type -> nid -> Type Arguments action _ _%type_scope
a_safe : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid), Actions.action W V this -> state -> Prop
verify : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), state -> DT this W A -> (A -> state -> Prop) -> Prop
nid = nat : Set
a_step : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state), Actions.a_safe a s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
state = union_map Label dstatelet : Type
act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type), action W A this -> DT this W A
network_rely = fun (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) => exists n : nat, network_rely' w this n s1 s2 : world -> nid -> state -> state -> Prop
bind_rule : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (q : cont A) (r : cont B), verify i e1 q -> (forall (y : A) (j : state), q y j -> j \In Coh W -> verify j (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
call_rule' : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (f : DT this W A) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> pre_of f i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), post_of f i x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i f k
vrf_post : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> verify i e (fun (x : A) (m : state) => forall m' : state, network_rely W this m m' -> k x m')
call_rule : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : Pred state) (q : A -> Pred state) (i : state) (e : DHT[this,W](p,q)) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> p i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i (with_spec e) k
alw_act : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> exists S : a_safe a s2, P s2 (Act a) /\ (forall (s3 : state) (v : A) (s4 : state), a_step S s3 v -> network_rely W this s3 s4 -> P s4 (Ret v))) -> always s1 (Act a) P
vrf_pre : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i i' : state) (k : cont A), verify i e k -> network_rely W this i i' -> verify i' e k
Actions.Action : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a_safe : state -> Prop), (forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W) -> forall a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop, (forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r) -> (forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2) -> Actions.action W V this
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
step : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e1 : DT this W A) (e2 : A -> DT this W B) (i : state) (r : cont B), verify i e1 (fun (y : A) (m : state) => verify m (e2 y) r) -> verify i (x <-- e1; e2 x) r
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
alw_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : state -> proc this V A -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> always i p P -> always (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this W A) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & (exists q' : proc this V A, q = Inject w q' /\ P i' q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P i' (Ret v'))])
gh_ex : forall (W : world) (A C : Type) (s : C -> spec A) (f : DTbin this W (logvar s)) (g : C) (i : state) (k : cont A), verify i (with_spec (Do with_spec f)) k -> verify i (with_spec f) k
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
binarify = fun (A : Type) (p : pre) (q : cont A) => (p, fun (i : state) (y : A) (m : state) => p i -> q y m) : forall A : Type, pre -> cont A -> spec A Arguments binarify {A}%type_scope
vrf_coh : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
stepAct : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (a : action W A this) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (t : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Act a) sc s2 t < -> (exists (v : A) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), [/\ sc = ActStep, t = Ret v & a_step pf s2 v])
vrf_mono : forall (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r1 r2 : cont A), r1 <== r2 -> verify i e r1 -> verify i e r2
ghC : forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (e : DT this W A) (p : B -> pre) (q : B -> A -> pre), (forall (i : state) (x : B), p x i -> i \In Coh W -> verify i e (q x)) -> conseq e (logvar (fun x : B => binarify (p x) (q x)))
alw_ret : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always s1 (Ret v) P
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
alw_unfin' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always_sc s1 Unfinished scs P
logvar = fun (B A : Type) (s : A -> spec B) => (fun i : state => exists x : A, (s x).1 i, fun (y : state) (i : B) (m : state) => forall x : A, (s x).2 y i m) : forall B A : Type, (A -> spec B) -> spec B Arguments logvar {B A}%type_scope _%function_scope
a_step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
Actions.step_sem : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
proc_sind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> SProp), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rec : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Set), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_ind : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Prop), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
proc_rect : forall (this : nid) (P : forall (W : world) (A : Type), proc this W A -> Type), (forall (W : world) (A : Type), P W A Unfinished) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : A), P W A (Ret a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), P W A (Act a)) -> (forall (W : world) (A B : Type) (p : proc this W B), P W B p -> forall p0 : B -> proc this W A, (forall b : B, P W A (p0 b)) -> P W A (Seq p p0)) -> (forall (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks) (i : injects V W K) (p : proc this V A), P V A p -> P W A (Inject i p)) ->...-> forall (W : world) (A : Type) (p : proc this W A), P W A p
stepSeq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A B : Type) (s1 : state) (t : proc this W B) (k : B -> proc this W A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Seq t k) sc s2 q < -> (exists v : B, [/\ sc = SeqRet, t = Ret v, q = k v, s2 = s1 & s1 \In Coh W]) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (p' : proc this W B), [/\ sc = SeqStep sc', q = Seq p' k & pstep s1 t sc' s2 p'])
aft_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : A -> state -> Prop), (forall (v : A) (s0 : state), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 v s0 -> P2 v s0) -> after s p P1 -> after s p P2
act_has_spec : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (a : action W A this), act_prog a \In has_spec this W (act_s a)
rely_trans : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 s3 : state), network_rely w this s1 s2 -> network_rely w this s2 s3 -> network_rely w this s1 s3
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
alw_envsq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s1 p1 P -> always s1 p1 (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
Actions.a_step : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state), Actions.a_safe a s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
alwp_envsq : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (p1 : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s1 p1 scs P -> always_sc s1 p1 scs (fun (s2 : state) (p2 : proc this W A) => forall s3 : state, network_rely W this s2 s3 -> P s3 p2)
rely_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')

``` 
intros j H. apply bind_rule.
- intros y k m [pf pf_step] H0 H1. split.
  + apply call_rule' with (x:=y) (m:=m).
    * apply vrf_post with (e:=a) (i:=j) (k:=pf).
      apply H, H0.
    * intros y' l H2 H3 H4.
      apply vrf_pre with (i:=m); auto.
      apply vrf_coh with (i:=j) (r:=pf).
      apply H0; auto. apply rely_ext with (i:=m) (j:=l); auto.
  + intros k' m' H2.
    apply vrf_pre with (i:=m); auto. apply rely_trans with (s2:=j); auto.
++ intros. apply vrf_pre with (i:=m'); auto. apply rely_trans with (s2:=j); auto.
```

original: intros j H. apply bind_rule. - intros y k m [pf pf_step] H0 H1. split. + apply call_rule' with (x:=y) (m:=m). * apply vrf_post with (e:=a) (i:=j) (k:=pf). apply H, H0. * intros y' l H2 H3 H4. apply vrf_pre with (i:=m); auto. apply vrf_coh with (i:=j) (r:=pf). apply H0; auto. apply rely_ext with (i:=m) (j:=l); auto. + intros k' m' H2. apply vrf_pre with (i:=m); auto. apply rely_trans with (s2:=j); auto. ++ intros. apply vrf_pre with (i:=m'); auto. apply rely_trans with (s2:=j); auto.
